title: Bank Markazi Tower
text: The Tower of Bank Markazi () is a <a href="high-rise%20building">high-rise building</a> located in <a href="Davoodiyeh">Davoodiyeh</a> neighborhood of <a href="Tehran">Tehran</a>, between <a href="Shahid%20Haghani%20Expressway">Shahid Haghani Expressway</a> and <a href="Mirdamad%20Boulevard">Mirdamad Boulevard</a>. Its facade is made of dark blue reflective glasses, making it a reverse <a href="panopticon">panopticon</a>. The building belongs to the <a href="Central%20Bank%20of%20Iran">Central Bank of Iran</a>.
